nodes.text: General Skylast was a Human male who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. Around 3641 BBY he was stationed in the Belsavis prison on Belsavis, where he coordinated the defense of the Maximum Security Section against an assault by the Esh-kha. He tasked a Republic citizen with striking against key strategic points of the Esh-kha forces and later advised him on the matter of the World Razer. The individual proved their worth and both the Esh-kha and World Razer were prevented from leaving the planet.
Sometime later, he was contacted by Republic Marshall Kay Cavarat to send troops to apprehend crime lord Ivory, which he gladly did.
